snippet: Our readers will be already advised of the occurrence of a lamentable riot and loss of the life at Christiana, Lancaster Co., Pa., on the 9th inst.,--growing out of the attempted capture of two fugitive slaves by their owner....
lead_paragraph: Our readers will be already advised of the occurrence of a lamentable riot and loss of the life at Christiana, Lancaster Co., Pa., on the 9th inst.,--growing out of the attempted capture of two fugitive slaves by their owner.

headline.main: Fugitive Slave Riot in Laucuster Co., Pa.
